scripts.html: pandoc resume.md -f markdown -t html -c resume-stylesheet.css -s -o resume.html
scripts.pdf: pandoc resume.md -f markdown -t pdf --pdf-engine=wkhtmltopdf -c resume-stylesheet.css -s -o resume.pdf
scripts.word: pandoc resume.md -f markdown -t docx --pdf-engine=wkhtmltopdf -c resume-stylesheet.css -s -o resume.docx
